item.title: A Fresh Start, Online
item.description: There’s a bittersweet joy about launching a project site. On the one hand, I get to see the fruit of my labor and pride myself in learning something new. On the other, it’s an entirely new committment. Like much of life and the endeavours we take on, it’ll be an opportunity to navigate the waters of both pride and dissapointment. I’m not going to hold myself to any posting cadence. Whever inspiration strikes, hopefully I’ll be near my computer.
